div.p:
Welcome to Union City Schools!
At Union City Schools we live by our motto of “Excellence…our heritage, our commitment.” Our school system is recognized on both the state and national levels for academic and extra-curricular excellence. These superior accomplishments can only be achieved when you combine great students with the best teachers, administrators, Board of Education, and community. We are blessed in the Union City School System, but we do not take it for granted and work hard every day to make ourselves, school, and community better for the future.
Wesley Kennedy
Director of Union City Schools
> Read More from Mr. Kennedy
